solution_line_template: The three students want a total of {tolu_pencils}+{melissa_pencils}+{robert_pencils} = <<{tolu_pencils}+{melissa_pencils}+{robert_pencils}={total_pencils}>>{total_pencils} pencils

Each pencil cost {price_per_pencil_cents} cents so {total_pencils} pencils cost {price_per_pencil_cents}*{total_pencils} = <<{price_per_pencil_cents}*{total_pencils}={total_cost_cents}>>{total_cost_cents} cents

{cents_per_dollar} cents make a dollar so {total_cost_cents} cents make {total_cost_cents}/{cents_per_dollar} = <<{total_cost_cents}/{cents_per_dollar}={total_cost_dollars}>>{total_cost_dollars} dollars
